taglines: Party on like it's 2006!
Wii are here to Link.
Did you know you can connect your Wii console to the Internet?
As seen on Scott The Woz!
The Return of the Legendary WiiConnect24
Rediscover your Wii
Link back to Nintendo's golden age
Get Connected back to the Wii's past once again!
Wii Play. Do you?
You can do more with a Wii than just losing in Mario Kart!
The realest wii network revival service
If you don't like Wiilink, Wii are gonna have a problem!
Play as if you were back in your childhood!
Wii would like to play, again
Your childhood memories, connected to our servers
WiiLink, Wii Software beyond things
Fans do what Nintendon't
Now supports Wii Menu Ver. 4.4!
WiiLink definetly gives the 2006 vibes!
Linking the world, one Wii at a time
One of Nintendo's biggest steps in multiplayer gaming, Revived!

element.name: Forecast Channel
element.desc: Check out up-to-date weather forecasts from around the world

element.name: News Channel
element.desc: Stay informed with the latest news from around the world

element.name: Nintendo Channel
element.desc: Watch trailers, read reviews and download demos of DS games

element.name: Check Mii Out Channel
element.desc: Participate in contests and vote for your favorite Miis

element.name: Everybody Votes Channel
element.desc: Answer polls and see how your opinions compare to others

element.name: Food Channel
element.desc: Order different types of meals from home via your Wii console

element.name: TV Guide Channel
element.desc: Check out the TV schedule and watch trailers of upcoming shows

element.name: Kirby TV Channel
element.desc: Watch episodes of the Kirby: Right Back at Ya! TV show

element.name: Photo Prints Channel
element.desc: Order prints of your favorite photos from your Wii console

element.name: Wii Room
element.desc: Discover shows and video-on-demand content in a more novel way
